otherNames: こいけん！～私たちアニメになっちゃった！～
synopsis: KoiKen Love Research club member Wakamiya Kaede comments that being an idol must be extremely easy- A comment that irritates idol Toyama Nagisa. At the suggestion of her manager, all female members of the KoiKen club are invited to become an idol unit with Nagisa. Kaede then realizes that maybe being an idol isn't so easy after all...
